titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation forbidding all assessing, collecting, and paying of the twentieth part and of all vveekly taxes by colour of any order or ordinances, and all entring in protestations and associations against his Majestie.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation forbidding all assessing, collecting, and paying of the twentieth part and of all vveekly taxes by colour of any order or ordinances, and all entring in protestations and associations against his Majestie.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: At foot of text: "Given at Our court at Oxford the eight day of March, in the eighteenth yeer of Our reign. 1642. God save the King."
London reprint of the Oxford original. -- Steele.
With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
